body: I AM THE HACKER OF THIS SERVER AND IN THIS SERVER, I WILL GET EVERYONE as a SIMILAR IP TO ME. WHEN I SAY THIS, THIS MEANS EVERY SINGLES PERSON. I WILL MAKE YOU HAVE A SIMILAR IP TO ME SO I CAN BAN EVADE YOU!!. You will be tolerated and YOU WILL BE DESTROYED BY ME SO YOU WILL BE BANNED PERMANENTLY FOREVER from AVICUS for BAN EVADING!!!!! AND HACKING!!!!!!!!!!!!!! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHHHHHHHHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I HAVE ALREADY BANNNED TWO PEOPLE FROM THIS SERVER BECAUSE I PUT THEM AS A SIMILAR IP AS ME AND ACT LIKE THEY WERE HACKERS AND THEY WERE ACTUALLY NOT HACKERS.  I WILL GET EVERYONE OF YOU GUYS SO YOU GUYS CAN GET BANNED FOREVER FROM THIS SERVER. MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. GOOD LUCK EVERYONE. I AM COMING TO YOUR SERVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I WAS ALREADY BANNED BECAUSE I WAS HACKING AND WAS TRYING TO BAN EVADE 35 other PEOPLE in THIS SERVER. BUT MORE OF YOU GUYS WILL BE MINE AS MY IP!!!!!!!!!! YOU GUYS WILL GET BANNED. MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! I AM GOING TO GET AN UNBAN SO I CAN GET UNBANNED FRFOM THIS SERVER AND WILL BAN MORE OF YOU GUYS BY MAKING YOU GUYS HAVE A SIMILAR IP TO ME!!!!!!!!!!!! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHA!!!!!!!! SO LONG SUCKERS!!!!!!!!!!!! MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAH!
